original_text: As she stood behind him at his feet weeping, she began to wet his feet with her tears. Then she wiped them with her hair, kissed them and poured perfume on them.
korean_text: 예수의 뒤로 그 발 곁에 서서 울며 눈물로 그 발을 적시고 자기 머리털로 닦고 그 발에 입맞추고 향유를 부으니

sentences.original_text: As she stood behind him at his feet weeping
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀가 그의 발 뒤에 서서 울면서

sentences.original_text: she began to wet his feet with her tears
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 눈물로 그의 발을 적시기 시작했다

sentences.original_text: Then she wiped them with her hair
